descriptions.tire: We replace tires quickly, precisely, and with full safety. Using modern equipment – you save time and get the job done right.
descriptions.diagnostic: We quickly detect and efficiently fix problems. Using professional diagnostics, we guarantee high-quality repairs with no delays.
descriptions.moto: Your motorcycle is in good hands. We service it precisely, on time, and with passion – because we know how important reliability is.
descriptions.maintenance: We take care of every detail – from oil changes to full system checks. Everything is done thoroughly, quickly, and with your peace of mind in mind.
descriptions.ac: We refill and service air conditioning systems efficiently and reliably. Enjoy cool, fresh air even during the hottest days.

why.speedText: Fast service without compromising quality — always on time and top level.
why.languagesText: Four languages, one standard — smooth communication in English, Polish, Ukrainian and Russian.
why.honestyText: Fair prices, clear terms, and a personal approach to every customer.

about.title: ABOUT US
about.paragraph1: We are a <bold>premium car service in Warsaw</bold> with a special focus on high-class vehicles. As an <bold>official partner of BMW and Mercedes-Benz</bold>, we are authorized to enter service records into the service book, which preserves warranty and gives confidence to every owner.
about.paragraph2: We service vehicles of brands like BMW, Porsche, Mercedes-Benz, Audi, Range Rover, and more, including motorcycles. We use <bold>original spare parts</bold> and <bold>professional equipment</bold>, and all work is performed by specialists who truly know what they’re doing.
